        public abstract List search(String search,
          org.jbiowhcore.utility.constrains.JPLConstrains constrains)
                     throws SQLException
        Perform the search
        Parameters:
        search - The search string
        constrains - The JPLConstrains object to be used in the search
        Returns:
        a List object with the result obtained
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • search

        public List search(List search,
          org.jbiowhcore.utility.constrains.JPLConstrains constrains)
            throws SQLException
        Perform the search
        Parameters:
        search - is a List object with the internal list has 4 elements. The first element is the logical operator to link with the previous condition (empty string for the first list). The second element is the FIELD on the DataSet to be used to compare. The third element is the operator to compare. The fourth element is the string to be searched.
        constrains - the JPLConstrains object to be used in the search
        Returns:
        a List object with the result obtained
        Throws:
        SQLException
